org.aavso.tools.vstar.plugin
Interface ObservationSourcePluginBase

All Superinterfaces:
PluginBase
public interface ObservationSourcePluginBase
extends PluginBase

This is the base class for all observation source plug-in classes.

Method Summary

          Get the name of the star associated with the current observation dataset.
 AbstractObservationRetriever getObservationRetriever()
           Get an observation retriever for this plug-in.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.aavso.tools.vstar.plugin.PluginBase
getDescription, getDisplayName
 

Method Detail

getObservationRetriever

AbstractObservationRetriever getObservationRetriever()

Get an observation retriever for this plug-in.

A new observation retriever instance should be created for each call to this method to avoid side-effects relating to clearing of collections by Mediator upon each new-star-artefact creation operation.

Returns:
An observation retriever.

getCurrentStarName

java.lang.String getCurrentStarName()
Get the name of the star associated with the current observation dataset.

Returns:
The current star name.
